content: Stocks Discussion Investments REITs Asked by AnonymousAsked 3w agoRegarding the Lendlease REIT IPO results, is the allotment random?Let’s say if I apply for 3000 shares, will I get the full 3000 shares or will it be a random amount of shares, say 1000, allocated to me?1 answerAnswerBump1

Guo Hao Teo, Self-Taught Enthusiast at Personal FinanceLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered 3w agoYou can actually check your bank account which you applied. I just did also and realized I wasn’t allocated any of this sadly... However, I have some friends also who got partially filled, like some other previous IPOs I participated in which were not oversubscribed.0 comments1
